title: Create Hello Game Unity Scene
description: Create a Unity scene (MainScene) with: 1) Canvas with Screen Space Overlay and Canvas Scaler set to Scale With Screen Size (1080x1920 portrait). 2) BackgroundImage: full-screen Image component, color #1a1a2e. 3) TitleText: TextMeshProUGUI showing 'Hello Game', font size 72, white, centered. 4) ColorButton: Button at bottom, blue (#4A90D9), with 'Change Color' text. 5) GameManager empty GameObject with GameManager.cs script attached, references wired to TitleText and ColorButton. The GameManager.cs script is already provided in Assets/Scripts/. Open the project in Unity 2022.3.47f1c1, create the scene, wire everything up, and take a screenshot of the running game.
acceptance_criteria: AC1: Game launches within 3 seconds, no black screen
AC2: Dark blue background (#1a1a2e) fills entire screen, no black edges
AC3: 'Hello Game' text displayed centered on screen, white color (#FFFFFF), font size 72
AC4: 'Change Color' button visible at bottom center, blue (#4A90D9), clickable
AC5: Clicking button changes title text color immediately (under 50ms response)
AC6: 10 consecutive button clicks without crash
AC7: Screenshot of running game submitted to .task/screenshots/
